verses.1: This is the written account of Adam's line. When God created man, he made him in the likeness of God.
verses.2: He created them male and female and blessed them. And when they were created, he called them "man. "
verses.3: When Adam had lived 130 years, he had a son in his own likeness, in his own image; and he named him Seth.
verses.4: After Seth was born, Adam lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.5: Altogether, Adam lived 930 years, and then he died.
verses.6: When Seth had lived 105 years, he became the father of Enosh.
verses.7: And after he became the father of Enosh, Seth lived 807 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.8: Altogether, Seth lived 912 years, and then he died.
verses.9: When Enosh had lived 90 years, he became the father of Kenan.
verses.10: And after he became the father of Kenan, Enosh lived 815 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.11: Altogether, Enosh lived 905 years, and then he died.
verses.12: When Kenan had lived 70 years, he became the father of Mahalalel.
verses.13: And after he became the father of Mahalalel, Kenan lived 840 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.14: Altogether, Kenan lived 910 years, and then he died.
verses.15: When Mahalalel had lived 65 years, he became the father of Jared.
verses.17: Altogether, Mahalalel lived 895 years, and then he died.
verses.16: And after he became the father of Jared, Mahalalel lived 830 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.19: And after he became the father of Enoch, Jared lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.18: When Jared had lived 162 years, he became the father of Enoch.
verses.21: When Enoch had lived 65 years, he became the father of Methuselah.
verses.20: Altogether, Jared lived 962 years, and then he died.
verses.22: And after he became the father of Methuselah, Enoch walked with God 300 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.25: When Methuselah had lived 187 years, he became the father of Lamech.
verses.24: Enoch walked with God; then he was no more, because God took him away.
verses.27: Altogether, Methuselah lived 969 years, and then he died.
verses.26: And after he became the father of Lamech, Methuselah lived 782 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.29: He named him Noah and said, "He will comfort us in the labor and painful toil of our hands caused by the ground the LORD has cursed."
verses.28: When Lamech had lived 182 years, he had a son.
verses.31: Altogether, Lamech lived 777 years, and then he died.
verses.30: After Noah was born, Lamech lived 595 years and had other sons and daughters.
verses.32: After Noah was 500 years old, he became the father of Shem, Ham and Japheth.
